titleStmt.title: An artificiall apologie, articulerly [sic] answerynge to the obstreperous obgannynges of one W.G. euometyd to the vituperacion of the tryumphant trollynge Thomas Smyth / repercussed by the ryght redolent & rotounde rethorician R. Smyth, P. with annotacio[n]s of the mellifluous and misticall Master Mynterne, marked in the mergent for the enucliacion of certen obscure obelisques, to thende that the imprudent lector shulde not tytubate or hallucinate in the labyrinthes of the lucubratiuncle.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted at London by Rycharde Bankes. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. And to be sell [sic] in Pater noster rowe at the signe of the Rose,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: Pater noster rowe at the signe of the Rose
